response.explain: The previous action code has successfully put the ham hocks in the stockpot. Now, we need to cook the ham hocks in the stockpot.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take the ham hocks from the fridge
(3) Grasp the ham hock
(4) Put the ham hocks in the stockpot
(5) Cook the ham hocks in the stockpot
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 5: Cook the ham hocks in the stockpot
    stockpot = registry(env, "stockpot_81")
    cook(robot, stockpot)
    donothing(env)
